name: Bowling Green Greenmarket
description:
Bowling Green Greenmarket is located at Broadway & Battery Pl.

Operating hours are
Tuesday
Thursday, 8am - 5pm

The location is open Year-round (Currently closed due to COVID),
and accepts EBT.

description:

Friday, 8am - 7pm

The location is open Year-round (Currently closed due to COVID),
and accepts EBT.

name: God's Love We Deliver
description:
God's Love We Deliver is located at 166 Avenue Of The Americas
New York, NY 10013
which has Soup Kitchen programs.

Operating hours are
FRI:9AM-3PM,MON:9AM-3PM,
THU:9AM-3PM,TUE:9AM-3PM,
WED:9AM-3PM

Please call 212-294-8129 to confirm the latest operating hours.
